ingredients.ingredient: 5 pounds yellow potatoes, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch cubs
¼ cup butter at room temperature
¼ cup cream cheese at room temperature
½ cup warm milk, or more as needed
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Use room-temperature butter and cream cheese; cold dairy will break up the smooth texture
Drain potatoes thoroughly and let them steam-dry in the pot for 1-2 minutes before mashing
Add warm milk gradually while mixing to achieve your desired consistency
enrichment.coachingPrompt: These are fluffy and luxurious. Want tips on making them ahead and reheating?
